lender.name: Ad Delivery
lender.occupational_info:
Ad Delivery Solutions Inc (ADS) provides products and services for open-source ad serving.
ADS builds ad serving systems for publishers, marketers and networks using the OASIS ad server and OpenX open-source ad servers on a fully open-source Linux/Apache/PHP/MySQL (LAMP) platform.

lender.name: Christians 4 Christ 101â„¢
lender.loan_because:
I am a (born-again) Christian-Israelite who has been blessed to be a blessing & also because it is more blessed to give than it is to receive. Service in itself, is its own reward.
Luke 6:38 (KJV) Give, and it shall be given unto you; good measure, pressed down, and shaken together, and running over, shall men give into your bosom. For with the same measure that ye mete withal it shall be measured to you again.
lender.occupational_info: Creationist, Physicist, Geneticist, Chemist, Soul winner, Prophecy teacher, etc.

lender.name: Rugabirwa
lender.loan_because: I was an public agent until 1994, but with the war in DRC I lose my job and now I am a farmer in Ruzizi, Uvira, DRC. So, I have not possibility for access to credit in the Bank because I have not a garantie or an hypotheque to give to the Bank for to get money from them. These money will help me for to grow or improve agriculture because I have 20ha who needed to be cultivate. So that I loan from Kiva to help me to change my life and my familly.
lender.occupational_info: I am a farmer in Ruzizi, DRC, I have 20ha who needed to be cultivate or to farm, but I have no money to do it myself, because it will take neer 3,000 usd, so that I loan to Kiva to assist me by the loan for to improve agriculture and to contribute to food security in our region or our country. I think if I get the loan from Kiva I will use 30vpeople to work in my field who will get some salaries for to change their life and there family. I am ready to accept any invitation from Kiva team or his partner present in my Country.

lender.name: Nyiramahoro
lender.loan_because: I am a widower from 1997 during the war in DRC, I have 2 children with me, I have nothing to do now because I have not money to support me, I loan because I need to do something for to change the life of my familly, to support education of my children, to pay health, food and others needs of the familly.
lender.occupational_info: I loan money to do business. I like to trade, to make food trade between Rwanda and DRC, because all food we eat in Bukavu comes from Rwanda. So, this activity is easy for me and can change our life. If I get 630usd, I can begin my trade business of food and after 4 monthes I can payed the loan I got from Kiva and can contribute to helpe others widowers who are in the same conditions with me through Kiva.

lender.name: Delphine
lender.loan_because: I believe kindness must be passed on.

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: Of my experience traveling abroad last summer in Uganda, AFRICA. I want to help spread hope around the world and help empower people, especially women to help them become their own entrepreneurs, and their own biggest success. I want them to see that THEY can accomplish big things and achieve their dreams, and help their children achieve theirs.
lender.occupational_info: I am educating myself :)

lender.name: Margaret & Ralph
lender.loan_because: We are grateful to God for what he has provided and want to help others to achieve their potential.
lender.occupational_info: As retirees we both work in community projects assisting people with emergency assistance and providing support and transport to aged and disabled.

lender.name: Chris Aable
lender.loan_because: As with many people, I naturally care and I hope more will too, as well as walk our talk. If love means wishing everyone a better world, I can honestly say I love just about everyone. This is one of many ways that I am honored to manifest that love, not out of commands nor religious bromides, but because I learned early on that all of humanity is bonded by more similarities than differences. If love means wanting the very best for others than I can honestly say I love every one.
lender.occupational_info: I am fortunate to have been self-employed most of my life, which means working hard but loving it because it has given me the time to practice my philosophy of life - which is that the best way to love life is to love many things, because life consists of so many things to see, be and do. To that end, in my spare time, I have worked in the fields of Social Work, Psychology, Sociology, Acting, Comedy, Song Writing, Music Production and was an Acting Coach at AFI and the Gardner Stage. I even took off for six months to help a friend with his business, and lived in Manhattan, New York City, during that time, just south of Times Square. When we begin to think more of others and less of yourselves, we earn more love and respect. When we give more love and respect, we earn more love and respect. It may not always be given what we think is due us, but at least we have earned more self-respect in knowing that we are making the world better, for when we increase the happiness and comfort of one human being or animal, we have increased the world's happiness and comfort in total. That is worthy of love and respect, even if it's only your own when you look in the mirror.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I want to help others succeed in life.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a store and I am a salesman, I like to help people.

lender.loan_because: I have 4 children and also work hard, I would like to think that if I needed it someone would do the same for me and my family.
lender.occupational_info: I help and accompany women during childbirth, hopefully ensuring that they have a memorable and safe birthing experience.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I am able to do so. I believe that each person who is able to help in some way should do so.

lender.name: Mellissa

lender.name: Tara

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: It's good to help people.

lender.name: Tolulope
lender.loan_because: I have, because very small amounts can make a huge difference in people's lives and there is enough money and resources in the world to meet all the needs that exist.
lender.occupational_info: I help distribute solutions that give people a better quality of life, such as better forms of lighting than kerosene, better ways of cooking than firewood or kerosene, through www.resurgeafrique.com

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have a chance to live their dream.
lender.occupational_info: I work at the Small Business Development Center at a local college. We try to help people start a business or expand.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: If I have an extra $25 and it could improve someone else's quality of life, then why not? Especially in this type of situation where the people I'm lending my money to are trying to help themselves and make things better through their own hard work.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit dental foundation that travels around my area providing free dental services to children in need. :-)

lender.name: Michele D.
lender.loan_because: A good friend of mine introduced me to Kiva. Although it sounds very cliche, I want to make a difference and help people. This is a concrete way to directly help people improve their lives. We're all here to help each other...that is what life is about.

lender.name: Edwin
lender.loan_because: I believe microfinance will change the world

lender.name: For Jackie, my mom
lender.loan_because: Happy mother's day mom! You give so much to us so in your name I loaned money to other mom's so they can give their kids the same opportunities as we were afforded.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a chance to succeed.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I fix computers.

lender.name: ilia
lender.loan_because: My mother left some money when she passed away and she would be happy to know that it can be used to help so many people.

lender.name: Lyn
lender.loan_because: So very little can make such a difference in a life. I can change lives around the world. What a gift!

lender.name: Juan
lender.loan_because: I feel I can make a big difference in somebody's life with my small donations
lender.occupational_info: I'm a political theory and logic student

lender.name: Marek
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: christie

lender.name: Rosemary
lender.loan_because: We should all help each other whenever we can.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large company helping other adults learn job skills. My area of focus is using computers to learn.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Even though I maybe financially poor by my country's standards, I am financially rich by the standards of other countries and believe I can make a difference, $25 at a time.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for everyone who has believed in my potential and supported my success. Kiva is a way I can support the hard work and dreams of people who do not have the material resources which came so easily to me.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children, and their parents and teachers, who have learning differences and often struggle to succeed in school.

lender.occupational_info: Financial Services / Insurance

lender.name: Megan
lender.occupation: Full time Mum and part time student
lender.loan_because: I'm considered a slightly lower income earner than an average Australian however I feel extremely privileged. I know the conditions that other people have to live in other areas of the world and I want to do my bit to help. Even though I haven't got much money to spare I try my best to support as many charities as possible and when I heard of Kiva I thought it was a brilliant idea. I also use Kiva and other charities to teach my children that it is important to give to people that are less fortunate than ourselves.
lender.occupational_info: I spend a lot of my time raising and having fun with my three children and I have recently taken time off work to study.

lender.name: gloria
lender.loan_because: to give certainty to women's projects
lender.occupational_info: leverage people to communicate

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: What seems like a relatively small amount of money to me can be life changing to someone across the world.

lender.name: Mitch

lender.occupational_info: I work with people- building communities is what I love.

lender.name: Stacey

lender.occupational_info: I am a full time student, part-time homemaker/housewife

lender.name: Coles Martial Arts
lender.loan_because: we care.

lender.name: Erin J
lender.loan_because: I wanted to help. I felt like i was being called by God.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school.

lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I want to focus on improving the lives of women and their children.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: Simply, because I want to help. I am lucky enough that I CAN help a little bit right now, so I do. I also understand how quickly life can change. Maybe one day I'll be in a position where I need help from others. Until then, I'll do what I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to non-native speakers

lender.name: Erica

lender.name: mark
lender.loan_because: A little goes a long way

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: It's important that we all actively participate in making a better world for ourselves, those around us, and those in our world's future.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I want to help my fellow man.

lender.name: Cecilia
lender.loan_because: I find it great being able to fight poverty in this way. I like the idea of lending money to entrepreneurs around the world and that my small contributions can make a difference to their living conditions.

lender.name: Traci
lender.loan_because: A rising tide raises all ships
